definition: to search a house and confiscate possessions
to make a copy/to plagiarize/to search and seize/to raid/to grab/to go off with/to take a shortcut/to make a turning move/to fold one's arms

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to execute the whole family and confiscate their property
to take inventory of and confiscate a criminal's possessions/to search and confiscate (forbidden items)/to raid
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
to involve others (in a crime)/guilt by association
to sack/to remove from a position/to depose
to banish (to an army post, as a punishment)
to dismiss from office/to resign from office
(of an official) to lose one's job
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
